+ import axios from &#39;axios&#39;
+ import { ElMessage } from &#39;element-plus&#39;
+ 
+ // åˆ›å»ºaxioså®ä¾‹
+ const createRequest = (baseURL) =&gt; {
+   const instance = axios.create({
+     baseURL: baseURL || import.meta.env.VITE_API_BASE_URL || &#39;http://localhost:5000&#39;,
+     timeout: 30000,
+     headers: {
+       &#39;Content-Type&#39;: &#39;application/json;charset=UTF-8&#39;
+     }
+   })
+ 
+   // è¯·æ±‚æ‹¦æˆªå™¨
+   instance.interceptors.request.use(
+     config =&gt; {
+       return config
+     },
+     error =&gt; {
+       console.error(&#39;è¯·æ±‚é”™è¯¯ï¼š&#39;, error)
+       return Promise.reject(error)
+     }
+   )
+ 
+   // å“åº”æ‹¦æˆªå™¨
+   instance.interceptors.response.use(
+     response =&gt; {
+       const res = response.data
+       
+       // æ ¹æ®åç«¯è¿”å›çš„codeåˆ¤æ–­
+       if (res.code === 200 || res.code === 201) {
+         return res
+       } else {
+         ElMessage.error(res.message || &#39;è¯·æ±‚å¤±è´¥&#39;)
+         return Promise.reject(new Error(res.message || &#39;è¯·æ±‚å¤±è´¥&#39;))
+       }
+     },
+     error =&gt; {
+       console.error(&#39;å“åº”é”™è¯¯ï¼š&#39;, error)
+       let message = &#39;ç½‘ç»œé”™è¯¯&#39;
+       
+       if (error.response) {
+         message = &#96;è¯·æ±‚å¤±è´¥ï¼š${error.response.status} ${error.response.statusText}&#96;
+       } else if (error.request) {
+         message = &#39;ç½‘ç»œè¿æ¥å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·æ£€æŸ¥ç½‘ç»œ&#39;
+       }
+       
+       ElMessage.error(message)
+       return Promise.reject(error)
+     }
+   )
+ 
+   return instance
+ }

+ import { createRequest } from &#39;@/utils/request&#39;

+ /**
+  * æ•°æ®åº“APIç±»
+  * æ”¯æŒåŠ¨æ€åˆ‡æ¢åç«¯åœ°å€
+  */
+ export class DatabaseAPI {
+   constructor(baseURL) {
+     this.request = createRequest(baseURL)
+   }
+ 
+   /**
+    * æ„å»ºæŸ¥è¯¢å‚æ•°
+    * @param {Object} filters - ç­›é€‰æ¡ä»¶å¯¹è±¡
+    * @returns {Object} - URLæŸ¥è¯¢å‚æ•°å¯¹è±¡
+    */
+   buildQueryParams(filters) {
+     const params = {}
+     
+     if (!filters) return params
+ 
+     Object.keys(filters).forEach(key =&gt; {
+       const filter = filters[key]
+       
+       if (!filter || filter.value === undefined || filter.value === null || filter.value === &#39;&#39;) {
+         return
+       }
+ 
+       const { type, operator, value } = filter
+ 
+       switch (type) {
+         case &#39;int&#39;:
+         case &#39;decimal&#39;:
+           // æ•°å€¼å‹ï¼šæ”¯æŒ &gt;ã€&lt;ã€=ã€&gt;=ã€&lt;=
+           switch (operator) {
+             case &#39;&gt;&#39;:
+               params[&#96;${key}_gt&#96;] = value
+               break
+             case &#39;&gt;=&#39;:
+               params[&#96;${key}_gte&#96;] = value
+               break
+             case &#39;&lt;&#39;:
+               params[&#96;${key}_lt&#96;] = value
+               break
+             case &#39;&lt;=&#39;:
+               params[&#96;${key}_lte&#96;] = value
+               break
+             case &#39;=&#39;:
+               params[key] = value
+               break
+           }
+           break
+           
+         case &#39;varchar&#39;:
+           // å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å‹ï¼šæ¨¡ç³ŠæŸ¥è¯¢
+           params[&#96;${key}_like&#96;] = value
+           break
+           
+         case &#39;date&#39;:
+         case &#39;timestamp&#39;:
+           // æ—¥æœŸå‹ï¼šèŒƒå›´æŸ¥è¯¢
+           if (filter.startDate) {
+             params[&#96;${key}_start&#96;] = filter.startDate
+           }
+           if (filter.endDate) {
+             params[&#96;${key}_end&#96;] = filter.endDate
+           }
+           break
+           
+         default:
+           // é»˜è®¤ç²¾ç¡®åŒ¹é…
+           params[key] = value
+       }
+     })
+ 
+     return params
+   }
+ 
+   /**
+    * åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢
+    * @param {String} tableName - è¡¨å
+    * @param {Number} page - é¡µç 
+    * @param {Number} pageSize - æ¯é¡µæ¡æ•°
+    * @param {Object} filters - ç­›é€‰æ¡ä»¶
+    * @param {String} orderBy - æ’åºå­—æ®µ
+    * @param {Boolean} orderDesc - æ˜¯å¦é™åº
+    */
+   async getList(tableName, page = 1, pageSize = 10, filters = {}, orderBy = &#39;&#39;, orderDesc = false) {
+     const params = {
+       page,
+       page_size: pageSize,
+       ...this.buildQueryParams(filters)
+     }
+ 
+     if (orderBy) {
+       params.order_by = orderBy
+       params.order_desc = orderDesc
+     }
+ 
+     return this.request.get(&#96;/api/${tableName}/&#96;, { params })
+   }
+ 
+   /**
+    * æ ¹æ®IDæŸ¥è¯¢è¯¦æƒ…
+    * @param {String} tableName - è¡¨å
+    * @param {Number} id - è®°å½•ID
+    */
+   async getById(tableName, id) {
+     return this.request.get(&#96;/api/${tableName}/${id}&#96;)
+   }
+ 
+   /**
+    * æ–°å¢è®°å½•
+    * @param {String} tableName - è¡¨å
+    * @param {Object} data - è®°å½•æ•°æ®
+    */
+   async create(tableName, data) {
+     return this.request.post(&#96;/api/${tableName}/&#96;, data)
+   }
+ 
+   /**
+    * æ›´æ–°è®°å½•
+    * @param {String} tableName - è¡¨å
+    * @param {Number} id - è®°å½•ID
+    * @param {Object} data - æ›´æ–°çš„æ•°æ®
+    */
+   async update(tableName, id, data) {
+     return this.request.put(&#96;/api/${tableName}/${id}&#96;, data)
+   }
+ 
+   /**
+    * åˆ é™¤è®°å½•
+    * @param {String} tableName - è¡¨å
+    * @param {Number} id - è®°å½•ID
+    */
+   async delete(tableName, id) {
+     return this.request.delete(&#96;/api/${tableName}/${id}&#96;)
+   }
+ 
+   /**
+    * è·å–è¡¨å­—æ®µä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆé€šè¿‡åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢ç¬¬ä¸€æ¡æ•°æ®ï¼‰
+    * @param {String} tableName - è¡¨å
+    */
+   async getTableSchema(tableName) {
+     try {
+       const response = await this.getList(tableName, 1, 1)
+       if (response.data &amp;&amp; response.data.data &amp;&amp; response.data.data.length &gt; 0) {
+         const firstRecord = response.data.data[0]
+         return Object.keys(firstRecord)
+       }
+       return []
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error(&#39;è·å–è¡¨ç»“æ„å¤±è´¥ï¼š&#39;, error)
+       return []
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   /**
+    * æ¨æ–­å­—æ®µç±»å‹ï¼ˆåŸºäºå€¼çš„ç±»å‹åˆ¤æ–­ï¼‰
+    * @param {*} value - å­—æ®µå€¼
+    * @returns {String} - å­—æ®µç±»å‹
+    */
+   inferFieldType(value) {
+     if (value === null || value === undefined) {
+       return &#39;varchar&#39; // é»˜è®¤æ–‡æœ¬ç±»å‹
+     }
+ 
+     // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºæ—¥æœŸæ—¶é—´å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
+     if (typeof value === &#39;string&#39;) {
+       // timestampæ ¼å¼ï¼šYYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss
+       if (/^\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}\s\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2}/.test(value)) {
+         return &#39;timestamp&#39;
+       }
+       // dateæ ¼å¼ï¼šYYYY-MM-DD
+       if (/^\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}$/.test(value)) {
+         return &#39;date&#39;
+       }
+       return &#39;varchar&#39;
+     }
+ 
+     if (typeof value === &#39;number&#39;) {
+       return Number.isInteger(value) ? &#39;int&#39; : &#39;decimal&#39;
+     }
+ 
+     return &#39;varchar&#39;
+   }
+ 
+   /**
+    * è·å–è¡¨ç»“æ„åŠç±»å‹ä¿¡æ¯
+    * @param {String} tableName - è¡¨å
+    */
+   async getTableSchemaWithTypes(tableName) {
+     try {
+       const response = await this.getList(tableName, 1, 1)
+       if (response.data &amp;&amp; response.data.data &amp;&amp; response.data.data.length &gt; 0) {
+         const firstRecord = response.data.data[0]
+         const schema = {}
+         
+         Object.keys(firstRecord).forEach(key =&gt; {
+           schema[key] = this.inferFieldType(firstRecord[key])
+         })
+         
+         return schema
+       }
+       return {}
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error(&#39;è·å–è¡¨ç»“æ„å¤±è´¥ï¼š&#39;, error)
+       return {}
+     }
+   }
+ }

+ import { defineStore } from &#39;pinia&#39;
+ import { ref, computed } from &#39;vue&#39;
+ import { DatabaseAPI } from &#39;@/api/database&#39;
+ 
+ /**
+  * æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥ç®¡ç†Store
+  */
+ export const useDatabaseStore = defineStore(&#39;database&#39;, () =&gt; {
+   // å­˜å‚¨çš„æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥åˆ—è¡¨
+   const connections = ref([])
+   
+   // å½“å‰æ¿€æ´»çš„è¿æ¥
+   const activeConnectionId = ref(null)
+ 
+   // ä»localStorageåŠ è½½è¿æ¥é…ç½®
+   const loadConnections = () =&gt; {
+     try {
+       const saved = localStorage.getItem(&#39;database_connections&#39;)
+       if (saved) {
+         connections.value = JSON.parse(saved)
+       }
+       
+       const savedActive = localStorage.getItem(&#39;active_connection_id&#39;)
+       if (savedActive) {
+         activeConnectionId.value = savedActive
+       }
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error(&#39;åŠ è½½æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥é…ç½®å¤±è´¥ï¼š&#39;, error)
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   // ä¿å­˜è¿æ¥é…ç½®åˆ°localStorage
+   const saveConnections = () =&gt; {
+     try {
+       localStorage.setItem(&#39;database_connections&#39;, JSON.stringify(connections.value))
+       if (activeConnectionId.value) {
+         localStorage.setItem(&#39;active_connection_id&#39;, activeConnectionId.value)
+       }
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error(&#39;ä¿å­˜æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥é…ç½®å¤±è´¥ï¼š&#39;, error)
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   // æ·»åŠ è¿æ¥
+   const addConnection = (connection) =&gt; {
+     const newConnection = {
+       id: Date.now().toString(),
+       name: connection.name,
+       baseURL: connection.baseURL,
+       tableName: connection.tableName,
+       description: connection.description || &#39;&#39;,
+       createdAt: new Date().toISOString()
+     }
+     
+     connections.value.push(newConnection)
+     saveConnections()
+     
+     return newConnection
+   }
+ 
+   // æ›´æ–°è¿æ¥
+   const updateConnection = (id, updates) =&gt; {
+     const index = connections.value.findIndex(c =&gt; c.id === id)
+     if (index !== -1) {
+       connections.value[index] = {
+         ...connections.value[index],
+         ...updates,
+         updatedAt: new Date().toISOString()
+       }
+       saveConnections()
+       return true
+     }
+     return false
+   }
+ 
+   // åˆ é™¤è¿æ¥
+   const deleteConnection = (id) =&gt; {
+     const index = connections.value.findIndex(c =&gt; c.id === id)
+     if (index !== -1) {
+       connections.value.splice(index, 1)
+       
+       // å¦‚æœåˆ é™¤çš„æ˜¯å½“å‰æ¿€æ´»çš„è¿æ¥ï¼Œæ¸…ç©ºæ¿€æ´»çŠ¶æ€
+       if (activeConnectionId.value === id) {
+         activeConnectionId.value = null
+         localStorage.removeItem(&#39;active_connection_id&#39;)
+       }
+       
+       saveConnections()
+       return true
+     }
+     return false
+   }
+ 
+   // è®¾ç½®æ¿€æ´»è¿æ¥
+   const setActiveConnection = (id) =&gt; {
+     const connection = connections.value.find(c =&gt; c.id === id)
+     if (connection) {
+       activeConnectionId.value = id
+       localStorage.setItem(&#39;active_connection_id&#39;, id)
+       return true
+     }
+     return false
+   }
+ 
+   // è·å–å½“å‰æ¿€æ´»çš„è¿æ¥
+   const activeConnection = computed(() =&gt; {
+     if (!activeConnectionId.value) return null
+     return connections.value.find(c =&gt; c.id === activeConnectionId.value)
+   })
+ 
+   // è·å–å½“å‰æ¿€æ´»è¿æ¥çš„APIå®ä¾‹
+   const getActiveAPI = () =&gt; {
+     if (!activeConnection.value) {
+       return null
+     }
+     return new DatabaseAPI(activeConnection.value.baseURL)
+   }
+ 
+   // æ ¹æ®IDè·å–è¿æ¥çš„APIå®ä¾‹
+   const getAPIById = (id) =&gt; {
+     const connection = connections.value.find(c =&gt; c.id === id)
+     if (!connection) {
+       return null
+     }
+     return new DatabaseAPI(connection.baseURL)
+   }
+ 
+   // åˆå§‹åŒ–æ—¶åŠ è½½æ•°æ®
+   loadConnections()
+ 
+   return {
+     connections,
+     activeConnectionId,
+     activeConnection,
+     addConnection,
+     updateConnection,
+     deleteConnection,
+     setActiveConnection,
+     getActiveAPI,
+     getAPIById,
+     loadConnections
+   }
+ })
+

+     &lt;el-dialog

+           &lt;el-input v-model=&quot;formData.name&quot; placeholder=&quot;è¯·è¾“å…¥è¿æ¥åç§°&quot; /&gt;

+   &lt;/div&gt;
+ &lt;/template&gt;

+ &lt;script setup&gt;
+ import { ref, reactive } from &#39;vue&#39;
+ import { ElMessage, ElMessageBox } from &#39;element-plus&#39;
+ import { Plus } from &#39;@element-plus/icons-vue&#39;
+ import { useDatabaseStore } from &#39;@/stores/database&#39;
+ import { DatabaseAPI } from &#39;@/api/database&#39;
+ 
+ const databaseStore = useDatabaseStore()
+ 
+ const dialogVisible = ref(false)
+ const dialogMode = ref(&#39;add&#39;) // &#39;add&#39; | &#39;edit&#39;
+ const formRef = ref(null)
+ const editingId = ref(null)
+ 
+ const formData = reactive({
+   name: &#39;&#39;,
+   baseURL: &#39;&#39;,
+   tableName: &#39;&#39;,
+   description: &#39;&#39;
+ })
+ 
+ const rules = {
+   name: [{ required: true, message: &#39;è¯·è¾“å…¥è¿æ¥åç§°&#39;, trigger: &#39;blur&#39; }],
+   baseURL: [
+     { required: true, message: &#39;è¯·è¾“å…¥åç«¯åœ°å€&#39;, trigger: &#39;blur&#39; },
+     {
+       pattern: /^https?:\/\/.+/,
+       message: &#39;è¯·è¾“å…¥æœ‰æ•ˆçš„URLåœ°å€&#39;,

+     }

+ // é‡ç½®è¡¨å•
+ const resetForm = () =&gt; {
+   formData.name = &#39;&#39;
+   formData.baseURL = &#39;&#39;
+   formData.tableName = &#39;&#39;
+   formData.description = &#39;&#39;
+   editingId.value = null
+ }
+ 
+ // æ‰“å¼€æ·»åŠ å¯¹è¯æ¡†
+ const openAddDialog = () =&gt; {
+   resetForm()
+   dialogMode.value = &#39;add&#39;
+   dialogVisible.value = true
+ }
+ 
+ // æ‰“å¼€ç¼–è¾‘å¯¹è¯æ¡†
+ const openEditDialog = (row) =&gt; {
+   dialogMode.value = &#39;edit&#39;
+   editingId.value = row.id
+   formData.name = row.name
+   formData.baseURL = row.baseURL
+   formData.tableName = row.tableName
+   formData.description = row.description || &#39;&#39;
+   dialogVisible.value = true
+ }
+ 
+ // æäº¤è¡¨å•
+ const handleSubmit = async () =&gt; {
+   if (!formRef.value) return
+ 
+   await formRef.value.validate((valid) =&gt; {
+     if (valid) {
+       if (dialogMode.value === &#39;add&#39;) {
+         databaseStore.addConnection(formData)
+         ElMessage.success(&#39;æ·»åŠ æˆåŠŸ&#39;)
+       } else {
+         databaseStore.updateConnection(editingId.value, formData)
+         ElMessage.success(&#39;æ›´æ–°æˆåŠŸ&#39;)
+       }
+       dialogVisible.value = false
+       resetForm()
+     }
+   })
+ }
+ 
+ // æ¿€æ´»è¿æ¥
+ const activateConnection = (id) =&gt; {
+   if (databaseStore.setActiveConnection(id)) {
+     ElMessage.success(&#39;è¿æ¥å·²æ¿€æ´»&#39;)
+   } else {
+     ElMessage.error(&#39;æ¿€æ´»å¤±è´¥&#39;)
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // æµ‹è¯•è¿æ¥
+ const testConnection = async (row) =&gt; {
+   const loading = ElMessage.info(&#39;æ­£åœ¨æµ‹è¯•è¿æ¥...&#39;)
+   
+   try {
+     const api = new DatabaseAPI(row.baseURL)
+     await api.getList(row.tableName, 1, 1)
+     loading.close()
+     ElMessage.success(&#39;è¿æ¥æµ‹è¯•æˆåŠŸ&#39;)
+   } catch (error) {
+     loading.close()
+     ElMessage.error(&#39;è¿æ¥æµ‹è¯•å¤±è´¥ï¼š&#39; + error.message)
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // åˆ é™¤è¿æ¥
+ const handleDelete = (row) =&gt; {
+   ElMessageBox.confirm(
+     &#96;ç¡®å®šè¦åˆ é™¤è¿æ¥ &quot;${row.name}&quot; å—ï¼Ÿ&#96;,
+     &#39;åˆ é™¤ç¡®è®¤&#39;,
+     {
+       confirmButtonText: &#39;ç¡®å®š&#39;,
+       cancelButtonText: &#39;å–æ¶ˆ&#39;,
+       type: &#39;warning&#39;
+     }
+   )
+     .then(() =&gt; {
+       if (databaseStore.deleteConnection(row.id)) {
+         ElMessage.success(&#39;åˆ é™¤æˆåŠŸ&#39;)
+       } else {
+         ElMessage.error(&#39;åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥&#39;)
+       }
+     })
+     .catch(() =&gt; {})
+ }
+ &lt;/script&gt;
+ 
+ &lt;style scoped&gt;
+ .page-container {
+   height: 100%;
+ }
+ &lt;/style&gt;
+ 
```

+             v-model=&quot;formData[field.name]&quot;
+             type=&quot;datetime&quot;
+             format=&quot;YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss&quot;
+             value-format=&quot;YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss&quot;
+             style=&quot;width: 100%;&quot;
+           /&gt;
+           
+           &lt;!-- æ–‡æœ¬ç±»å‹ --&gt;
+           &lt;el-input
+             v-else
+             v-model=&quot;formData[field.name]&quot;
+             :type=&quot;field.multiline ? &#39;textarea&#39; : &#39;text&#39;&quot;
+             :rows=&quot;3&quot;
+           /&gt;
+         &lt;/el-form-item&gt;
+       &lt;/el-form&gt;
+       &lt;template #footer&gt;
+         &lt;el-button @click=&quot;dialogVisible = false&quot;&gt;å–æ¶ˆ&lt;/el-button&gt;
+         &lt;el-button type=&quot;primary&quot; @click=&quot;handleSubmit&quot; :loading=&quot;submitting&quot;&gt;
+           ç¡®å®š
+         &lt;/el-button&gt;
+       &lt;/template&gt;
+     &lt;/el-dialog&gt;
+   &lt;/div&gt;
+ &lt;/template&gt;
+ 
+ &lt;script setup&gt;
+ import { ref, reactive, computed, onMounted } from &#39;vue&#39;
+ import { ElMessage, ElMessageBox } from &#39;element-plus&#39;
+ import { Plus, Refresh } from &#39;@element-plus/icons-vue&#39;
+ import { useDatabaseStore } from &#39;@/stores/database&#39;
+ import AdvancedFilter from &#39;@/components/AdvancedFilter.vue&#39;
+ 
+ const databaseStore = useDatabaseStore()
+ 
+ const loading = ref(false)
+ const submitting = ref(false)
+ const tableData = ref([])
+ const tableSchema = ref({}) // å­—æ®µå -&gt; ç±»å‹
+ const displayFields = ref([]) // æ˜¾ç¤ºçš„å­—æ®µåˆ—è¡¨
+ const activeCollapse = ref([&#39;filter&#39;])
+ 
+ const pagination = reactive({
+   page: 1,
+   pageSize: 10,
+   total: 0
+ })
+ 
+ const dialogVisible = ref(false)
+ const dialogMode = ref(&#39;add&#39;) // &#39;add&#39; | &#39;edit&#39;
+ const formRef = ref(null)
+ const formData = ref({})
+ const editingId = ref(null)
+ const currentFilters = ref({})
+ 
+ // å¯ç¼–è¾‘çš„å­—æ®µï¼ˆæ’é™¤ä¸»é”®å’Œè‡ªåŠ¨æ›´æ–°å­—æ®µï¼‰
+ const editableFields = computed(() =&gt; {
+   return tableFields.value.filter(field =&gt; {
+     // æ’é™¤å¸¸è§çš„è‡ªåŠ¨å­—æ®µ
+     const autoFields = [&#39;ZBXH&#39;, &#39;GXSJ&#39;, &#39;id&#39;, &#39;created_at&#39;, &#39;updated_at&#39;]
+     return !autoFields.includes(field.name)
+   })
+ })
+ 
+ // è¡¨å­—æ®µåˆ—è¡¨ï¼ˆç”¨äºç­›é€‰ç»„ä»¶ï¼‰
+ const tableFields = computed(() =&gt; {
+   return Object.keys(tableSchema.value).map(name =&gt; ({
+     name,
+     type: tableSchema.value[name]
+   }))
+ })
+ 
+ // è·å–ä¸»é”®å­—æ®µ
+ const getPrimaryKey = () =&gt; {
+   // å¸¸è§ä¸»é”®å­—æ®µå
+   const pkFields = [&#39;ZBXH&#39;, &#39;id&#39;, &#39;ID&#39;]
+   for (const field of pkFields) {
+     if (displayFields.value.includes(field)) {
+       return field
+     }
+   }
+   return displayFields.value[0] // é»˜è®¤ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå­—æ®µ
+ }
+ 
+ // åŠ è½½è¡¨ç»“æ„
+ const loadTableSchema = async () =&gt; {
+   const api = databaseStore.getActiveAPI()
+   if (!api) return
+ 
+   try {
+     const schema = await api.getTableSchemaWithTypes(
+       databaseStore.activeConnection.tableName
+     )
+     tableSchema.value = schema
+     displayFields.value = Object.keys(schema)
+     
+     if (Object.keys(schema).length &gt; 0) {
+       ElMessage.success(&#39;è¡¨ç»“æ„åŠ è½½æˆåŠŸ&#39;)
+       loadTableData()
+     } else {
+       ElMessage.warning(&#39;è¡¨ä¸­æš‚æ— æ•°æ®ï¼Œæ— æ³•è·å–è¡¨ç»“æ„&#39;)
+     }
+   } catch (error) {
+     ElMessage.error(&#39;åŠ è½½è¡¨ç»“æ„å¤±è´¥ï¼š&#39; + error.message)
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // åŠ è½½è¡¨æ•°æ®
+ const loadTableData = async () =&gt; {
+   const api = databaseStore.getActiveAPI()
+   if (!api) return
+ 
+   loading.value = true
+   try {
+     const response = await api.getList(
+       databaseStore.activeConnection.tableName,
+       pagination.page,
+       pagination.pageSize,
+       currentFilters.value
+     )
+ 
+     if (response.data) {
+       tableData.value = response.data.data || []
+       pagination.total = response.data.total || 0
+       pagination.page = response.data.page || 1
+       pagination.pageSize = response.data.page_size || 10
+     }
+   } catch (error) {
+     ElMessage.error(&#39;åŠ è½½æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥ï¼š&#39; + error.message)
+   } finally {
+     loading.value = false
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // æ ¼å¼åŒ–å€¼æ˜¾ç¤º
+ const formatValue = (value) =&gt; {
+   if (value === null || value === undefined) {
+     return &#39;-&#39;
+   }
+   return value
+ }
+ 
+ // é«˜çº§ç­›é€‰
+ const handleSearch = (filters) =&gt; {
+   currentFilters.value = filters
+   pagination.page = 1 // é‡ç½®åˆ°ç¬¬ä¸€é¡µ
+   loadTableData()
+ }
+ 
+ // é‡ç½®ç­›é€‰
+ const handleReset = () =&gt; {
+   currentFilters.value = {}
+   pagination.page = 1
+   loadTableData()
+ }
+ 
+ // åˆ†é¡µå˜åŒ–
+ const handlePageChange = (page) =&gt; {
+   pagination.page = page
+   loadTableData()
+ }
+ 
+ const handleSizeChange = (size) =&gt; {
+   pagination.pageSize = size
+   pagination.page = 1
+   loadTableData()
+ }
+ 
+ // é‡ç½®è¡¨å•
+ const resetForm = () =&gt; {
+   formData.value = {}
+   editingId.value = null
+ }
+ 
+ // æ‰“å¼€æ–°å¢å¯¹è¯æ¡†
+ const openAddDialog = () =&gt; {
+   resetForm()
+   dialogMode.value = &#39;add&#39;
+   
+   // åˆå§‹åŒ–è¡¨å•æ•°æ®
+   const initialData = {}
+   editableFields.value.forEach(field =&gt; {
+     initialData[field.name] = null
+   })
+   formData.value = initialData
+   
+   dialogVisible.value = true
+ }
+ 
+ // æ‰“å¼€ç¼–è¾‘å¯¹è¯æ¡†
+ const openEditDialog = (row) =&gt; {
+   dialogMode.value = &#39;edit&#39;
+   const pkField = getPrimaryKey()
+   editingId.value = row[pkField]
+   
+   // å¤åˆ¶è¡Œæ•°æ®åˆ°è¡¨å•
+   const data = {}
+   editableFields.value.forEach(field =&gt; {
+     data[field.name] = row[field.name]
+   })
+   formData.value = data
+   
+   dialogVisible.value = true
+ }
+ 
+ // æäº¤è¡¨å•
+ const handleSubmit = async () =&gt; {
+   const api = databaseStore.getActiveAPI()
+   if (!api) return
+ 
+   submitting.value = true
+   try {
+     // æ¸…ç†ç©ºå€¼
+     const submitData = {}
+     Object.keys(formData.value).forEach(key =&gt; {
+       const value = formData.value[key]
+       if (value !== null &amp;&amp; value !== undefined &amp;&amp; value !== &#39;&#39;) {
+         submitData[key] = value
+       }
+     })
+ 
+     if (dialogMode.value === &#39;add&#39;) {
+       await api.create(databaseStore.activeConnection.tableName, submitData)
+       ElMessage.success(&#39;æ–°å¢æˆåŠŸ&#39;)
+     } else {
+       await api.update(
+         databaseStore.activeConnection.tableName,
+         editingId.value,
+         submitData
+       )
+       ElMessage.success(&#39;æ›´æ–°æˆåŠŸ&#39;)
+     }
+ 
+     dialogVisible.value = false
+     loadTableData()
+   } catch (error) {
+     ElMessage.error(&#39;æ“ä½œå¤±è´¥ï¼š&#39; + error.message)
+   } finally {
+     submitting.value = false
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // åˆ é™¤è®°å½•
+ const handleDelete = (row) =&gt; {
+   const pkField = getPrimaryKey()
+   const id = row[pkField]
+ 
+   ElMessageBox.confirm(
+     &#96;ç¡®å®šè¦åˆ é™¤è¯¥è®°å½•å—ï¼Ÿ&#96;,
+     &#39;åˆ é™¤ç¡®è®¤&#39;,
+     {
+       confirmButtonText: &#39;ç¡®å®š&#39;,
+       cancelButtonText: &#39;å–æ¶ˆ&#39;,
+       type: &#39;warning&#39;
+     }
+   )
+     .then(async () =&gt; {
+       const api = databaseStore.getActiveAPI()
+       if (!api) return
+ 
+       try {
+         await api.delete(databaseStore.activeConnection.tableName, id)
+         ElMessage.success(&#39;åˆ é™¤æˆåŠŸ&#39;)
+         loadTableData()
+       } catch (error) {
+         ElMessage.error(&#39;åˆ é™¤å¤±è´¥ï¼š&#39; + error.message)
+       }
+     })
+     .catch(() =&gt; {})
+ }
+ 
+ // åˆå§‹åŒ–
+ onMounted(() =&gt; {
+   if (databaseStore.activeConnection) {
+     loadTableSchema()
+   }
+ })
+ &lt;/script&gt;
+ 
+ &lt;style scoped&gt;
+ .page-container {
+   height: 100%;
+ }
+ 
+ .card-header {
+   display: flex;
+   justify-content: space-between;
+   align-items: center;
+ }
+ 
+ .pagination-container {
+   margin-top: 20px;
+ }
+ &lt;/style&gt;
+ 
```

+ 
+     } catch (error) {

+       ElMessage.error(&#39;å¯¼å…¥å¤±è´¥ï¼š&#39; + error.message)
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   input.click()
+ }
+ 
+ // ä¸‹è½½é…ç½®æ¨¡æ¿
+ const handleDownloadTemplate = () =&gt; {
+   const template = subsystemConfigs.map(config =&gt; ({
+     name: config.name,
+     baseURL: config.baseURL,
+     tableName: config.tableName,
+     description: config.description
+   }))
+ 
+   const dataStr = JSON.stringify(template, null, 2)
+   const blob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: &#39;application/json&#39; })
+   const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob)
+   const link = document.createElement(&#39;a&#39;)
+   link.href = url
+   link.download = &#39;database_connections_template.json&#39;
+   link.click()
+   URL.revokeObjectURL(url)
+ 
+   ElNotification({

+     type: &#39;success&#39;,
+     duration: 3000
+   })
  }
